Description: This is a ESP LTD KH-602 Kirk Hammett Signature Series Guitar Black . It is in very good condition and plays awesome. Bonus case included. Bought it when I bought the guitar as pictured. Specs are following: Neck-thru-body constructionAlder body3-piece maple neckExtra-thin U-shaped neck contour25.5" scaleRosewood fingerboarddesign42mm nut width24 extra-jumbo fretsDual EMG-81 bridge and EMG-60 neck active humbuckersFloyd Rose 1000 Series tremolo bridgeLocking nutESP tuners2 volume, tone, and 3-way switching controlsSkull and bones inlaysBlack hardware Ships out 1-3 days after payment is recieved.On Dec-02-18 at 09:03:29 PST, seller added the following information: No major chips or dings. One small ding at the top of the body that is slightly indented but paint is intact just barley breaks the body line if you are looking really close at it. Camera wont pick it up. As far as scratches they are light from wipe downs. Plays super awesome. Fret board in great shape. Guitar runs for 899 new and I dropped an extra 125 for the ESP case. Has only that one real imperfection that I mentioned at the top of the body and the light scratches can be buffed out but can only be seen if your looking close at it.
